Articles.Content:
Hello all, Been playing with the game for around two weeks now and really like it! Mostly like the variation and diversity of the designs which can be made from stock or community added parts.

Will be posting a few of my latest designs soon, plus one or two challenge ideas i have had!

Glad to be here, Cant wait for more updates

StrangeyD

Welcome to the Forums.

Happy Launching!

From CarolRawley, your #1 supplier of things that will crash, burn, and kill your brain.

---Customer Testifications---

jgjiscool:'I can testify. Those things have crashed burned and definitely killed my brain.'

Thanks for the Welcome

Im currently adding some of my designs to the spacecraft exchange section, hope u like the designs!

StrangeyD
